channel.title: Mr. Nobody
channel.description: This movie is so good. You have to give it a chance or at least watch the [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mpi0qsp3v_w]trailer[/url]. At first it's so confusing and weird but it can completely change the way you look at the world. I thought it was an amazing movie.

item.title: Mr. Nobody
item.dc:creator: @Aeonscape Aeonscape
item.description:
@Aeonscape wrote:

Mr nobody is an excellent film, I’ve watched it twice.

The first time I watched the first 5 minutes and though it was shit.

About a year later I watched the first 30 minutes and could stop watch its one of them film that looks shit at the start but by the end you feel sad its over.

One of the best films ever you just have to give it a chance.

Its the same kind of thing with cloud atlas.

Read full topic

item.title: Mr. Nobody
item.dc:creator: @xEthanx xEthanx
item.description:
@xEthanx wrote:

[quote=“317guy, post:7, topic:541029”]I was searching through Unread Post’s and i found your topic, I thought to my self i haven’t watched a serious movie in ages so i decided to give this movie a try without even watching the trailer. I must say i was so F***ing confused but it made so much sense at the end thanks for the recommendation, With your taste in movies i wouldn’t mind some more

Edit: I forgot to mention, After watching this I see things a lot different.

Warning Dont Click Spolier unless watched movie[spoiler]I was so happy that he got to be with Anna at the end (Or start whichever way you see it )[/spoiler][/quote]
Glad you like it ;D I guess it’s an acquired taste (based on the feedback from other people here lol) but it’s nice to see some people see the beauty in it as well. I’ve got loads of other recommendations for you as I binge watch movies and shows on Netflix, but if you like odd/challenging endings I’d suggest you go for “No Country for Old Men” next, that’s also a controversial one that I just love, and the serial killer in that movie has just incredible acting.

Read full topic

item.title: Mr. Nobody
item.dc:creator: @317guy 317guy
item.description:
@317guy wrote:

I was searching through Unread Post’s and i found your topic, I thought to my self i haven’t watched a serious movie in ages so i decided to give this movie a try without even watching the trailer. I must say i was so F***ing confused but it made so much sense at the end thanks for the recommendation, With your taste in movies i wouldn’t mind some more

Edit: I forgot to mention, After watching this I see things a lot different.

Warning Dont Click Spolier unless watched movie[spoiler]I was so happy that he got to be with Anna at the end (Or start whichever way you see it )[/spoiler]

Read full topic

I can’t say if I liked it or not.
